title: Desk, early 20th century
description: In late 18th-century style. Elaborate marquetry and ormolu trimmed roll-top desk with five drawes under roll-top and single drawer of three compartments, each with hinged marquetry covers, in the apron. Louis XV legs, ormolu mounts, pierced gilt bronze gallery around top.

tombstone.epitaph: Desk, early 20th century.Various woods, gilt bronze, leather. 1952-167-1.
